Package ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.design

Interface LegacyDesignSupport.Provider

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, GameComponent, Serializable
Enclosing class:
LegacyDesignSupport
public static interface LegacyDesignSupport.Provider extends GameComponent
Implemented by game components that provide design support the pre-SE3.0 way.
Since:
3.0
